high_consensus.title: Activation integration gap — who calls activate?
high_consensus.description: SDD defines construct-workflow-activate.sh but doesn't specify who calls it. No integration point between construct skill invocation and activation script.
high_consensus.recommendation: Add Section 3.1.1 specifying that construct SKILL.md files include activation preamble, consistent with beads sync pattern.

high_consensus.title: gates_required naming misleading
high_consensus.description: gates_required reads as 'gates that are required' but actually means 'gates that must be non-skip for yield to apply'. Confusing semantics.
high_consensus.recommendation: Rename to yield_on_gates — reads as 'yield this constraint on these gates'.

high_consensus.title: review-sprint.md sprint.md check is context_files, not pre-flight
high_consensus.description: Section 3.6 shows skip_when on a pre_flight check for review-sprint.md, but the sprint.md dependency is actually in context_files (required: true), not pre_flight.
high_consensus.recommendation: Extend skip_when to work on context_files entries too. When condition met, treat file as optional.

disputed.title: 24h staleness check may be too aggressive
disputed.description: Section 8 proposes ignoring construct-workflow.json if >24h old. Long-running sessions could legitimately span >24h.
disputed.resolution: deferred — kept as-is with note that threshold is configurable in future
